options.name: Ambulance and Fire Services
options.description: Dial **995** for immediate medical or fire emergencies.

medialEmergencyData.title: Hospitals and Clinics
medialEmergencyData.description:
This is a bold paragraph.

Singapore boasts numerous world-class hospitals, with major facilities like Singapore General Hospital (SGH), **Raffles Hospital**, and **Mount Elizabeth Hospital** offering both emergency care and specialized medical services.
